The claim made by State Rep: Leo Berman that the Hawaii governor "can't find anything that says (President Barack Obama) was born in Hawaii."
The response from a subset of Obama crit: birthers" who doubt his natural-born U.S. citizenship and question the authenticity of his Hawaii birth document.
The conclusion reached by fact: checking organizations, PolitiFact National and FactCheck.org, that the birth certificate aired by Obama's campaign is authentic.
